db:info.db:title: Qt Quick Controls 1 - Table View Example

db:abstract.db:para: An example for the TableView control.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = tableview
RESOURCES += \ tableview.qrc
OTHER_FILES += \ main.qml
include(src/src.pri) include(../shared/shared.pri)
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quickcontrols/controls/tableview INSTALLS += target
